data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: The Peria Karamalai Tea & Produce Company Limited has informed the Exchange regarding  Board meeting held on February 03, 2026 have appointment of Mr. Anup Kumar Gupta, as Chief Financial Officer and Key Managerial Personnel of the Company with effect from 3rd February, 2026.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: The Peria Karamalai Tea & Produce Company Limited has submitted to the Exchange, a)the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025 and b)Appointment of Mr. Anup Kumar Gupta, as Chief Financial Officer and Key Managerial Personnel of the Company with effect from 3rd February, 2026

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: The Peria Karamalai Tea & Produce Company Limited has informed the Exchange regarding  Board meeting held on February 03, 2026 have appointment of Mr. Anup Kumar Gupta, as Chief Financial Officer and Key Managerial Personnel of the Company with effect from 3rd February, 2026.

data.caption: Appointment
data.news_body: The Peria Karamalai Tea & Produce Company Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Appointment of  ANUP KUMAR GUPTA as Chief Financial Officer of the company w.e.f. February 03, 2026.

data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: The Peria Karamalai Tea & Produce Company Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Proceedings of Postal Ballot. Further, the company has submitted the Exchange a copy of Srutinizers report along with voting results.

data.caption: Resignation
data.news_body: The Peria Karamalai Tea & Produce Company Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Resignation of  Mr. Sreenivasan Muthuswamy as Chief Financial Officer of the company w.e.f. November 15, 2025.

data.news_body: The Peria Karamalai Tea & Produce Company Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Appointment of  Mr. GAURAV JALAN as Non- Executive Independent Director of the company w.e.f. November 10, 2025.
